Fourth, **Asset Disposal:** This can be achieved through various methods: a straight sale of the entire business, an auction of individual assets, or a gradual liquidation of inventory. The method chosen depends on the nature of the assets and the urgency of the liquidation.

Sixth, **Distribution of Remaining Assets:** If any assets remain after all debts have been paid, they are distributed to the business owners according to their ownership percentages.

Seventh, **Formal Dissolution:** Once all assets have been liquidated and debts have been paid, the business must be formally dissolved with the appropriate government agencies.
